briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of GSP 301 Nasal Spray in the Treatment of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (SAR)
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel-Group Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (SAR) Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of GSP 301 Nasal Spray Compared With Placebo Nasal Spray and Individual Monotherapy Formulations (Olopatadine Hydrochloride Nasal Spray and Mometasone Furoate Nasal Spray) in Adult and Adolescent Subjects (12 Years of Age and Older)
summary: Study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of GSP 301 NS compared with placebo NS and individual monotherapy formulations for the treatment of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (subjects 12 years of age and older)

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Average AM and PM Subject-reported 12-hour Reflective Total Nasal Symptom Score (rTNSS)
